author: Alok Deshpande
text:
Days after Jawaharlal Nehru University Professor Vivek Kumar’s lecture on Dr Bababsaheb Ambedkar met with a protest from the BJP members in Gwalior, his lecture at the Tata Institute of Social Science (TISS) on Saturday was cancelled for ‘technical’ reasons.

While the TISS Director said the Professor missed his flight from Delhi to Mumbai after he was caught in traffic, heavy police deployment on the campus raised eyebrows as several faculty members indicated that the lecture was cancelled fearing protests. When contacted, Professor Kumar said, “I don’t know anything.”
title: Lecture at TISS cancelled
